name: Digital Support Technology
tag_list: pc-tech-support, tech-support, support, pc, computer-support, online-support, free-tech-support
overview:
Digital Support Technology (DST) (www.digitalsupporttech.com) aims to improve PC tech support with “PC Fixer,” a free online service that repairs a broad range of common computer problems, such as performance tuning issues, software glitches, problems with Microsoft Vista, Windows, or Office, security, maintenance difficulties, etc. DST provides PC Fixer for free.

DST founders hail from the engineering and managerial team at VMware, the pioneer of virtualization technology. DST has harnessed virtualization technology as a cornerstone for its PC labs, where technicians have been able to turn the physical aspects of a PC and its operating system into a virtual file. DST then analyzes and assesses a problem in different states to extract the precise conditions and apply the exact resolutions to various PCs and operating systems across the board in a successful, consistent manner.
